Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser/*******::
       He slowly turns around in his seat at the tactical station and looks 
at Major Tyrael very carefully.  "Major, I have two questions: First, who 
exactly says 'Beat them while they're hot'?  I've heard of 'striking while 
the iron is hot' or 'beat them while they're down' but never 'beat them while 
they're hot'.  Because frankly that just doesn't make any sense."  He takes a 
deep breath before beginning again.  "Secondly, why exactly are you planning 
the strategy.  HELLO, military strategist.  That is what they brought me out 
of retirement for.  If you'd like me to be doing something else then by all 
means reassign me, but right now I've got nothing to do except sit here and 
stare at the tactical console.  Oh yeah, that reminds me we have company 
incoming at a high rate of speed."

       The unknown bot finally stopped circling the mountain and flew in a 
straight line toward the nearest base, in this case the Tripred's.  He stops 
just outside the defensive perimeter and lands.

--part1_9.fc66b00.2bda126b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
